steps.title: Select an area with plenty of mobile users.
steps.content: Select an area with plenty of mobile users.

steps.title: Go to contacts in your Address Book.
steps.content: Go to contacts in your Address Book.

steps.title: Enter the message into the name part.
steps.content: Enter the message into the name part.

steps.title: Choose "send via Bluetooth".
steps.content: Choose "send via Bluetooth". These searches for any bluetooth device within range.

steps.title: Choose one phone and send the contact.
steps.content: Choose one phone and send the contact.

steps.title: You will get the message "card sent" and then listen for the SMS message tone of your victim's phone.
steps.content: You will get the message "card sent" and then listen for the SMS message tone of your victim's phone.

steps.title: Look out for the shock look in your victim.
steps.content: Look out for the shock look in your victim. And enjoy.
